scripts.buildLaboratory: gitbook build src/laboratory laboratory & gitbook pdf src/laboratory pdf/laboratory.pdf
scripts.buildGentou: gitbook build src/gentou gentou & gitbook pdf src/gentou pdf/gentou.pdf
scripts.buildKchis: gitbook build src/kchis kchis & gitbook pdf src/kchis pdf/kchis.pdf
scripts.commit: git add . --all && git commit -m update && git push origin master
scripts.save: npm run buildGentou && npm run buildKchis && npm run buildLaboratory &&  npm run commit
